file1.txt OverWrite ?(Yes/[No]/All/Skip) file1.txt	- Melting  :  .file1.txt	- Melting  :  ofile1.txt	- Melted

file3.txt OverWrite ?(Yes/[No]/All/Skip) file4.txt OverWrite ?(Yes/[No]/All/Skip)
